mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.*,CC.COMM_NAME,ROWNUM RNUM FROM COMMUNITY CC, ( SELECT COMM.COMM_NUM,NVL(COUNT(MEM.USER_NUM),0) CNT FROM COMMUNITY COMM,MEMBERS MEM WHERE COMM.USER_NUM=MEM.USER_NUM GROUP BY COMM.COMM_NUM ORDER BY CNT DESC )AA WHERE AA.COMM_NUM=CC.COMM_NUM ) WHERE RNUM>=1 AND RNUM<=10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.*,CC.COMM_NAME,ROWNUM RNUM FROM COMMUNITY CC, ( SELECT COMM.COMM_NUM,SUM(CB.CB_VIEWS) SUM FROM COMMUNITY COMM,COMM_BOARD CB WHERE COMM.COMM_NUM=CB.COMM_NUM GROUP BY COMM.COMM_NUM ORDER BY SUM DESC )AA WHERE AA.COMM_NUM=CC.COMM_NUM ) WHERE RNUM>=1 AND RNUM<=10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.*,ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT USER_REGDATE,NVL(COUNT(*),0) CNT FROM MEMBERS WHERE SYSDATE-USER_REGDATE<=#{period} GROUP BY USER_REGDATE ORDER BY USER_REGDATE ASC )AA ) WHERE RNUM>=1 AND RNUM<=10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.*,ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT MB_DATE,NVL(COUNT(*),0) CNT FROM MY_BOARD WHERE SYSDATE-MB_DATE<=#{period} GROUP BY MB_DATE ORDER BY MB_DATE ASC )AA ) WHERE RNUM>=1 AND RNUM<=10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.*,ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT CB_DATE,NVL(COUNT(*),0) CNT FROM COMM_BOARD WHERE SYSDATE-CB_DATE<=#{period} GROUP BY CB_DATE ORDER BY CB_DATE ASC )AA ) WHERE RNUM>=1 AND RNUM<=10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.*,ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT MB_DATE,SUM(MB_VIEWS) SUM FROM MY_BOARD WHERE SYSDATE-MB_DATE<=#{period} GROUP BY MB_DATE ORDER BY MB_DATE ASC )AA ) WHERE RNUM>=1 AND RNUM<=10
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.*,ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT CB_DATE,SUM(CB_VIEWS) SUM FROM COMM_BOARD WHERE SYSDATE-CB_DATE<=#{period} GROUP BY CB_DATE ORDER BY CB_DATE ASC )AA ) WHERE RNUM>=1 AND RNUM<=10
